$interpreted: : One month later...
Soohyeon: Li Hwa, I brought back the herbs you wanted.
Li Hwa: You're back? Great, just put them down on the ground.
Li Hwa: This ratio should be correct... Maybe the temperature's off...
Soohyeon: Eh? This is...
Soohyeon: This pendant's really pretty. Looks like a talisman of some sort.
Soohyeon: And it's glowing?
Li Hwa: Huh? Glowing?
Li Hwa: Soohyeon, do you feel something?
Soohyeon: It's warm... like being bathed in sunlight or something.
Soohyeon: It's a familiar feeling.
Li Hwa: Familiar? I thought that pendant was a dud... but it works for you, huh?
Soohyeon: What is this thing, Li Hwa?
Soohyeon: Eh? It stopped glowing.
Li Hwa: ...Could it be that you're the only one who can use it?
Soohyeon: Me? Why would it only work for me?
Li Hwa: I had a lot of free time back then, at the academy. I ended up reading a lot of mythology, and thought I'd try my hand at making one...
Li Hwa: The books called them 'divine seals'
Soohyeon: Divine seals? I think I've heard of those...
Soohyeon: They worked with celestial energy, right? Mythics wore them to better control their own immense energy?
Soohyeon: Soohyeon, you made one? You made a divine seal?
Li Hwa: Unfortunately, there's no celestial energy left in the east anymore... And those old books weren't complete, there was a lot missing...
Li Hwa: I could only muster up enough information at the Rune Academy to make this... It's similar, but not exactly the same...
Li Hwa: I call it a 'celestial net'.
Soohyeon: A celestial net? But it's still pretty similar to a divine seal, right?
Soohyeon: That's really amazing, Li Hwa!
Li Hwa: But anyway, you were saying you felt surrounded by a kind of warmth?
Soohyeon: Yes... I don't really know how to explain it. It was just this familiar, cozy feeling. Covering me like a blanket, sort of...
Li Hwa: Hmm... It's just a guess, but...
Li Hwa: Soohyeon, don't let go of that pendant. Now, touch this flower.
Soohyeon: B... But...
Li Hwa: Don't be scared. Even if it gets bewitched, we can handle it together.
Li Hwa: Amazing, just like I thought...!
Soohyeon: It didn't... change?
Li Hwa: Meong Sa, come here and help me with something.
Meong Sa: What is it? I was playing with Goldie...
Li Hwa: Soohyeon, give the pendant to Meong Sa for a moment.
Soohyeon: I want you to do a little experiment for me......
Meong Sa: But, I'm a bewitcher! I shouldn't be touching this pendant if it belongs to her!
Li Hwa: It's okay, this needs to be done.
Meong Sa: Alright...
Meong Sa: I'll do anything, if it means we might be able to go back home.
Soohyeon: Meong Sa!
Soohyeon: How!? I was just touching it, and nothing happened!
Li Hwa: As I thought, it seems that only Soohyeon can use it...
Meong Sa: Oh... I thought... I thought we might have finally been saved. Finally able to go back home...
Soohyeon: Meong Sa...
Li Hwa: Don't get discouraged now. This isn't like before.
Li Hwa: I think there's some new hope, now.
Soohyeon: ...New hope?
Li Hwa: I think the mythics' celestial energy might be the key here to understanding your afflictions.
Soohyeon: Do you think this is because I'm a mythic?
Li Hwa: Yes. I had a feeling back when I was at the academy, I think you mythics have a different sort of soul energy compared to normal people.
Li Hwa: I'm going to need to research this further!
Soohyeon: If this has to do with mythics, then...
Soohyeon: That means I can keep helping you, right?
Li Hwa: Of course. Here, you should hold on to this pendant, too.
Li Hwa: I need to see if it'll keep you from getting worse, or if it'll have any other sorts of effects.
Li Hwa: I'm going to need your help with this, Soohyeon. You're an indispensible part of my research, now.
Soohyeon: So... I'll be able to hug my mom again?
Soohyeon: Okay! I'll give it everything I've got!
Soohyeon: Don't worry Meong Sa, we're going to get you better!
Soohyeon: We'll get everyone better!
Meong Sa: ...I believe you. I believe in you both.
Meong Sa: I'm looking forward to your success. To the day we can all go back home again...!

Model.Text: One month later...
Li Hwa, I brought back the herbs you wanted.
You're back? Great, just put them down on the ground.
This ratio should be correct... Maybe the temperature's off...
Eh? This is...
This pendant's really pretty. Looks like a talisman of some sort.
And it's glowing?
Huh? Glowing?
Soohyeon, do you feel something?
It's warm... like being bathed in sunlight or something.
It's a familiar feeling.
Familiar? I thought that pendant was a dud... but it works for you, huh?
What is this thing, Li Hwa?
Eh? It stopped glowing.
...Could it be that you're the only one who can use it?
Me? Why would it only work for me?
I had a lot of free time back then, at the academy. I ended up reading a lot of mythology, and thought I'd try my hand at making one...
The books called them 'divine seals'
Divine seals? I think I've heard of those...
They worked with celestial energy, right? Mythics wore them to better control their own immense energy?
Soohyeon, you made one? You made a divine seal?
Unfortunately, there's no celestial energy left in the east anymore... And those old books weren't complete, there was a lot missing...
I could only muster up enough information at the Rune Academy to make this... It's similar, but not exactly the same...
I call it a 'celestial net'.
A celestial net? But it's still pretty similar to a divine seal, right?
That's really amazing, Li Hwa!
But anyway, you were saying you felt surrounded by a kind of warmth?
Yes... I don't really know how to explain it. It was just this familiar, cozy feeling. Covering me like a blanket, sort of...
Hmm... It's just a guess, but...
Soohyeon, don't let go of that pendant. Now, touch this flower.
B... But...
Don't be scared. Even if it gets bewitched, we can handle it together.
Amazing, just like I thought...!
It didn't... change?
Meong Sa, come here and help me with something.
What is it? I was playing with Goldie...
Soohyeon, give the pendant to Meong Sa for a moment.
I want you to do a little experiment for me......
But, I'm a bewitcher! I shouldn't be touching this pendant if it belongs to her!
It's okay, this needs to be done.
Alright...
I'll do anything, if it means we might be able to go back home.
Meong Sa!
How!? I was just touching it, and nothing happened!
As I thought, it seems that only Soohyeon can use it...
Oh... I thought... I thought we might have finally been saved. Finally able to go back home...
Meong Sa...
Don't get discouraged now. This isn't like before.
I think there's some new hope, now.
...New hope?
I think the mythics' celestial energy might be the key here to understanding your afflictions.
Do you think this is because I'm a mythic?
Yes. I had a feeling back when I was at the academy, I think you mythics have a different sort of soul energy compared to normal people.
I'm going to need to research this further!
If this has to do with mythics, then...
That means I can keep helping you, right?
Of course. Here, you should hold on to this pendant, too.
I need to see if it'll keep you from getting worse, or if it'll have any other sorts of effects.
I'm going to need your help with this, Soohyeon. You're an indispensible part of my research, now.
So... I'll be able to hug my mom again?
Okay! I'll give it everything I've got!
Don't worry Meong Sa, we're going to get you better!
We'll get everyone better!
...I believe you. I believe in you both.
I'm looking forward to your success. To the day we can all go back home again...!
